verses.roman:
śayānān vīra-śayāyāṁ
patīn āliṅgya śocatīḥ
vilepuḥ su-svaraṁ nāryo
visṛjantyo muhuḥ śucaḥ

synonyms: śayānān—lying; vīra—of a hero; śayāyām—upon the bed (the ground); patīn—their husbands; āliṅgya—embracing; śocatīḥ—feeling sorrow; vilepuḥ—lamented; su-svaram—loudly; nāryaḥ—the women; visṛjantyaḥ—shedding; muhuḥ—repeatedly; śucaḥ—tears.
translation: Embracing their husbands, who lay on a hero's final bed, the sorrowful women loudly lamented while shedding constant tears.
